name: Infernum Peak
storyline:
The action takes place in the tower "Infernum Peak". It is not known how you ended up in this tower, but its inhabitants do not care. They will prevent you from finding a way out. 
 
In addition to the traps and creatures attacking you, you feel like you are being watched by something beyond your understanding. You believe that in the end you will be able to get out...
summary: Infernum Peak is a horizontal platformer with two modes: Levels and Arcade Game.
